callFunction(address,(address,uint256),b.details: DyDx calls this function after doing flash loan

executeOperation(address[],uint256[],uin.details: Aave will call this function after doing flash loan

migrate(address).details: _beforeMigration hook can be implemented in child strategy to do extra steps.

rebalance().details: Rebalance profit, loss and investment of this strategy

sweepERC20(address).details: sweep given token to feeCollector of strategy

totalValue().details: Compound calculate rewardToken accrued and store it when user interact with Compound contracts, i.e. deposit, withdraw or transfer tokens. So compAccrued() will return stored rewardToken accrued amount, which is olderFor up to date value check totalValueCurrent()

totalValueCurrent().details: Report total value in collateral tokenClaimed rewardToken will stay in strategy until next rebalance

updateBorrowRatio(uint256,uint256).details: It is possible to set 0 as _minBorrowRatio to not borrow anything

withdraw(uint256).details: Withdraw collateral token from lending pool.

devdoc.title: Deposit ETH in Compound and earn interest.

addKeeper(address).notice: Add given address in keepers list.

currentBorrowRatio().notice: Current borrow ratio, calculated as current borrow divide by max allowed borrow Return value is based on basis points, i.e. 7500 = 75% ratio

getPosition().notice: Return supply and borrow position. Position may return few block old value

isLossMaking().notice: Calculate current position using claimed rewardToken and current borrow.

isReservedToken(address).notice: Check whether given token is reserved or not. Reserved tokens are not allowed to sweep.

migrate(address).notice: Migrate all asset and vault ownership,if any, to new strategy

removeKeeper(address).notice: Remove given address from keepers list.

token().notice: Returns address of token correspond to collateral token

totalValue().notice: Calculate total value using rewardToken accrued, supply and borrow position

totalValueCurrent().notice: Calculate total value based on rewardToken claimed, supply and borrow position

updateBorrowRatio(uint256,uint256).notice: Update upper and lower borrow ratio
